thread.title: Stach50
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by Stach50

author: Stach50
title: Stach50
text: Both arrived on time in great condition. The wax is to be used to paint on as starter strip for foundationless frames. The queen excluder is curiously shaped, and the outside frame edges are rounded, that will pose a water problem for the lower box, also it is only in a 1/2 inch deep wooden frame the dimensions were 19 15/16 by 13 5/8 by 1/2 , so it won't fit properly on my equipment but I will more than likely just modify it and hope it works out okay. My equipment is 19 7/8 by 14 inches. I may just cut a new wooden frame for it to fit my equipment, 19 7/8 long by 14 wide by 3/4 deep. There just doesn't seem to be any standardization in beekeeping equipment for some reason.
